Package it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions

Class WrongPlayException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions.WrongPlayException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WrongPlayException extends Throwable
Exception that is thrown if the play is not valid contains the information about the play

  • Constructor Details

    • WrongPlayException

      public WrongPlayException(Player player, int x, int y, Card card)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      player - the player that causes the exception
      x - the x-axis coordinate where the card cant be played
      y - the y-axis coordinate where the card cant be played negative values for x and y represent specific types of error
      card - the card that cant be played
